plot: The Bill ponders life through close observation of a $20 bill. It speaks of the fact that a $20 bill is unique in that it's the only bill that can be so little to one yet so much to another...
title: The Bill
plot_es: The Bill ponders life through close observation of a $20 bill. It speaks of the fact that a $20 bill is unique in that it's the only bill that can be so little to one yet so much to another...
